description:
When I launch an instance using the "nova boot" command and the "--hint force_hosts" option, the instance doesn't work on the assigned server.
I have made two servers: precise64 and slave101.
$ nova boot --image a46cc9f3-783a-48c5-82fd-1b646cd86f35 --flavor 1 --hint force_host=slave100 image01
$ nova show 2d3f4a17-1534-4738-8a94-8f4d9bd3fd00
+-------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| Property                            | Value                                                          |
+-------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| OS-DCF:diskConfig                   | MANUAL                                                         |
| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:host                | slave101                                                       |
| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:hypervisor_hostname | slave101 

The force_host is assigned "slave100" but the host is "slave101" in the "nova show" information.
title: Can't launch an instance on the assigned server with 'nova boot'
